title: Sound On: Sen. Jon Ossoff, WH Chip Summit
itunes:title: Sound On: Sen. Jon Ossoff, WH Chip Summit
description:
Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Congressman French Hill, a Republican representing Arkansas's 2nd congressional district, and Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media. Bloomberg's David Westin spoke to Democratic Georgia Senator Jon Ossoff.


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
